answers.answer: You really need to speak to a very good cardiologist about this situation. There are many things to take into account. For example, your heart failure may be stable now, but the medications are unlikely to be safe for the baby and if you come off them, your failure is likely to worsen. The cardiologist will weigh up the odds how risky it is for you AND the baby. I'm sorry I can't be more helpful but you really need expert advice and soon because any medications can be harmful to a baby.
